name: hub.email.javamail.config.mail.smtp.host
title: Mail SMTP Server Host
description: The SMTP server host to send emails

name: email.from.address
title: Email From Address
description: The From address for the email messages that are sent

name: email.reply.to.address
title: Email Reply To Address
description: The email address to reply to if the user chooses to reply

name: hub.email.template.variable.all.templates.subject.line
title: Default Subject Line
description: The default Subject line for all templates if none is specified

name: hub.email.notifier.variable.all.timezone
title: Default Timezone
description: The default Timezone to use when calculating date ranges to process notification data.  Please note if no Timezone is specified then UTC will be used by default.

name: hub.email.template.variable.all.templates.logo.image
title: Default Logo Image
description: Default logo image included with all email templates
